product_name: REI Sahara Convertible Pants with No-Sit Zips - Men's 28" Inseam
long_description: Lightweight men's REI Convertible Sahara Pants with 28 in. inseam offer comfort for the trail and a zipper design that provides a quick and easy transition from pants to shorts. No-Sit Zips make it possible to pause along the trail and peel off the lower legs without having to slide them over muddy footwear. Lightweight nylon fabric packs small, dries fast and has a durable water repellent finish. UPF 50+ rating provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Loaded with pockets for essentials, including many with secure zip closures and/or secure rip-and-stick closures. Center gusset and elastic in back waist ease movement; soft waistband liner and flat seams increase comfort. Reinforced cuff backs stand up to abrasion from boots. Men's REI Sahara Convertible Pants with 28 in. inseam have a relaxed fit that generously allows for comfort and movement.
